item.title: Coriander and Cumin Fried Pork
item.description: I cook this all the time. It's quick and easy. There are several variations of this recipe in Portugal depending on the region you come from. Where I'm from we call it *Fritada*but, for instance, in the North of Portugal they call it *Rojões*. I served it with rice but a more traditional way would be to top it with chopped pickles and serve it with fries. Unfortunately, I can't seem to find the right kind of pickles here in Denmark (an assortment of cauliflower, carrots and cucumber).
